long_description: The Scott Cascade Ovalized ski poles are designed to handle fast, aggressive skiing. Oval-shaped shaft is built with S4 Aluminum-the strongest commercially available, aircraft-grade aluminum alloy. Oval shape increases aerodynamic performance and structural rigidity and maintains excellent shock-absorption properties. Grip is anatomically engineered to give you full, comfortable contact with the grip surface; soft thermoplastic rubber enhances sensitivity. Strong nylon strap maintains wrist in perfect position and adjusts easily. 2.36 in. disc basket blends aerodynamic efficiency and durability; ideal for packed snow conditions. Scott Cascade Ovalized ski poles include an Ice Tip for superb hold in icy conditions.
short_description: The Scott Cascade Ovalized ski poles are designed to handle fast, aggressive skiing.
